column5: Rainbow Courts Motel has been in the same family for the past 100 years and is a Registered Texas Landmark Property. We have small rooms with one queen bed, larger rooms with a king bed, larger rooms with two queen beds and sleeper sofas and many rooms with full kitchens. Many of our rooms are stand alone cottages with no shared walls. We frequently host weddings and special occasions due to the nature of our property and the landscaped gardens.
